X moves Thunderbird to the tray, _ minimizes it. Just like Discord.

content:
Ciao, anzitutto come potrai immaginare questo non è un servizio di assistenza tecnica ma solo un forum di utenti.

Se fai una ricerca all'interno di questo forum vedrai che segnalazioni simili alla tua ce ne sono state diverse. Molte delle quali purtroppo non hanno avuto soluzione. Personalmente penso ci sia una qualche incompatibilità tra i server email di Aruba e Thunderbird ma non posso fare alcuna verifica perché non sono cliente della società.

Se vuoi analizzare i LOG di Thunderbird puoi seguire questa guida -> https://gioxx.org/2023/01/05/mozilla-thunderbird-visualizzare-un-log-completo-dellattivita-con-il-server-di-posta/ o questa guida -> https://turbolab.it/windows-10/come-creare-file-log-monitorare-connessioni-thunderbird-2351

content:
'

Geoff said

Run selected filter(s) on: XYZ

Hi Geoff.

You seem to be running the filter on the destination folder instead of the source folder (inbox).

To troubleshoot, you could enable the filter log and check it after running. I did some tests, and nothing appeared in the log, so I don't know what you will see.
creator: mozilla98

content: Thank you Rick. Usually the Message filter does display the inbox. During my initial setting up I must have done something to change that to destination - not sure what! Will take care next time.
creator: geoff60

content: This usually means something is interferring with Thunderbird's update of settings at shutdown. This might be an antivirus product or other firewall issue. This can often be verified by clicking help>troubleshootinginformation, scroll to 'profile folder' and click 'open folder.' the settings file is named prefs.js. If you see more than one, such as prefs-1.js, prefs-2.js, that is an indication of the problem. This occasionally happens when prefs.js is marked read-only. I do not know the solution for your particular situation. Let me know results of your review.
creator: davidsk

content: - click new account>email - on next screen, enter two items: name and email address and press enter. Thunderbird should then do the setup, and Yahoo may prompt for password. If you are having problems, please post error message and screenshot of the screen at time of error.
creator: davidsk

content:
Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content:
here is the info in brief steps:

  1. ensure thunderbird is NOT running on old machine
  2. enter %appdata% in search window on task bar and press Enter key
  3. this should open windows file explorer in Appdata\roaming folder
  4. highlight the Thunderbird folder and copy to external media
  5. ensure thunderbird is installed on second computer and not running
  6. enter %appdata% in search window on task bar and press Enter key
  7. you should be in Appdata\roaming folder , copy&paste the exported Thunderbird folder there. This may prompt to overwrite an existing folder of same name. allow it. This is to replace all content of the thunderbird folder. 
#   start thunderbird and all should be there
creator: davidsk
